name: Happy !
description:
The world is angry, sad, gloomy, and this needs to change !!! Share hugs and drop love cans to spread happiness !

Current version: This game has been developed during the Ludum Dare #32, and I am currently working on improving it. This is the version I released for the Ludum Dare #32. The next versions will be based on the same gameplay, but all the code will be re-written, difficulty will be re-calibrated, more features will appear, etc... The full game should be released somewhere around July.

For more news about the development, follow me on Twitter : @yamzho !
